title: Comenzar
intro: Learn about The Graph, a decentralized protocol for indexing and querying data from blockchains.

quickStart.title: Comienzo Rapido
quickStart.description: Jump in and start with The Graph

queryFromAnApplication.title: Query from an Application
queryFromAnApplication.description: Learn to query from an application

migrateFromHostedService.title: Migrate from Hosted Service
migrateFromHostedService.description: Migrating subgraphs to The Graph Network

networkRoles.title: Network Roles
networkRoles.description: Learn about The Graph’s network roles.

developer.title: Desarrollador
developer.description: Create a subgraph or use existing subgraphs in a dapp

indexer.title: indexación
indexer.description: Operador de nodos encargado de indexar los datos y proveer consultas

curator.title: curación
curator.description: Organiza los datos mediante la señalización de subgrafos

delegator.title: delegación
delegator.description: Se encarga de proteger la red al delegar sus GRT a los Indexadores

subgraphStudio.title: Subgraph Studio
subgraphStudio.description: Create, manage and publish subgraphs and API keys

graphExplorer.title: Graph Explorer
graphExplorer.description: Explora los distintos subgrafos e interactua con el protocolo

hostedService.title: Hosted Service
hostedService.description: Crea y explora subgrafos en el servicio alojado

supportedNetworks.title: Redes admitidas
supportedNetworks.description: The Graph supports the following networks on The Graph Network and the Hosted Service.
supportedNetworks.betaWarning: Network is in beta. Use with caution.
